QuestData.Title: Platform Adjustments
QuestData.Description:
It seems the last of the arcane disruption is up here.
I'll continue adjusting the ley energies. Use some of the arcana you recovered to dispel the disruptions here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Dispel $1oa Unstable Arcane Energies at the top of the Azure Archives.
QuestData.RewardText: Fine work! I can feel the ley lines beneath this place beginning to heal. We're almost done.
